name: GetCampaignEmailActivity
description:
Retrieve specific list member's activity in a campaign.

Get detailed information on a list member's activity in a campaign, including opens, clicks, and bounces, by providing the campaign ID and subscriber hash.

parameters.name: campaign_unique_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the campaign whose member activity is being retrieved.

value_schema.description: The unique id for the campaign.

parameters.name: subscriber_hash
parameters.description: The MD5 hash of the lowercase version of the list member's email address for which you want to retrieve activity.

value_schema.description: The MD5 hash of the lowercase version of the list member's email address.

parameters.name: fields_to_return
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of fields to return, using dot notation for sub-objects.

value_schema.description: A comma-separated list of fields to return. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

parameters.name: fields_to_exclude
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of fields to exclude from the response using dot notation for sub-objects.

value_schema.description: A comma-separated list of fields to exclude. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

parameters.name: restrict_activity_since
parameters.description: Restrict results to email activity events occurring after this time (ISO 8601 format).

value_schema.description: Restrict results to email activity events that occur after a specific time. Uses ISO 8601 time format: 2015-10-21T15:41:36+00:00.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Mailchimp Marketing API.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of fields to return. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

value_schema.description: A comma-separated list of fields to return. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

parameters.name: exclude_fields
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of fields to exclude. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

value_schema.description: A comma-separated list of fields to exclude. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

parameters.name: since
parameters.description: Restrict results to email activity events that occur after a specific time. Uses ISO 8601 time format: 2015-10-21T15:41:36+00:00.

value_schema.description: Restrict results to email activity events that occur after a specific time. Uses ISO 8601 time format: 2015-10-21T15:41:36+00:00.

parameters.name: campaign_id
parameters.description: The unique id for the campaign.

value_schema.description: The unique id for the campaign.

parameters.name: subscriber_hash
parameters.description: The MD5 hash of the lowercase version of the list member's email address.

value_schema.description: The MD5 hash of the lowercase version of the list member's email address.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
